MetaData.MetaDataItem: Everspring Z-Wave Dimmer/Lamp module Plug - 300 Series 919.8 MHz

The LPTDM1H is a plug-in Slave to receive the Command from the Controller or Routing Slave and through Controller or Routing Slave controls the ON/OFF status of the plug-in lighting fixtures, of which power loading cannot exceed 400W.
